snippet.title: Merchant of the Skies - Launch Trailer (Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1040070/Merchant_of_the_Skies/

Merchant of the Skies is on April 17 and we are happy to present you the final gameplay trailer!

In this trader simulator / rpg with base-building elements, start as a small merchant on a flying ship and work your way up to create a trade empire! The full release is going to feature a full-fledged campaign with different goals and missions, as well as numerous balancing and quality of life adjustments.

Releasing on April 17, 2020, wishlist today to get notified on release!
